customerQueue - Variable in class cs2030.simulator.Server
Servers have (1) A queue of waiting customers (2) A maximum size of queue; (3) An unique id; (4) A RandomGenerator that determines server's servicing and resting behaviors.
customers - Variable in class cs2030.simulator.SystemState
SystemState contains (1) A list of customers, (2) A list of human servers, (3) A list of self-checkout servers, (4) A shared queue of all self-checkout servers, (5) The maximum length of the shared queue.
